 import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CartService } from '../service/cart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.scss'] }) export class CartComponent { cartItems: string[] = []; constructor(private cartService: CartService) {} ngOnInit() { this.cartItems = this.cartService.getCartItems(); } }
